title: Beautiful Home in Great Location!
posting_body: **This home has all new flooring throughout -- vinyl plank flooring downstairs and new, quality carpeting upstairs.
Interested parties must complete an in-person showing with the owner of the property to be considered as a tenant.
If you're looking for clean, comfortable place to call home in a fantastic location... then look no further!
This is a GEM of an opportunity to live in a great neighborhood, near parks, schools, stores, restaurants, breweries, hospitals, and more, with easy access to all the major interstates and highways.

This newer, beautiful two-story home features two bedrooms, two full bathrooms, finished two-car attached garage, all new appliances, curved shower rods, ceiling fans, new furnace/AC, a fenced backyard with deck and patio, extra-large windows that let in lots of natural light, and NEW flooring throughout.
The townhome is a part of a beautiful, quiet community in a charming town with plenty to do, and is conveniently located only 30 miles from downtown Chicago.
It is available for move-in on July 30, 2022.
Due at lease signing is the first month's rent, last month's rent, and a $1,000 security deposit.
Pets are negotiable and require an additional pet fee.
Dyer, IN has made the list of 100 BEST PLACES TO LIVE in the nation, compiled by Money Magazine and CNN/Money in cooperation with data researchers from OnBoard.
Dyer earned its best scores for low crime rates and leisure opportunities (with 16 movie theaters, 2,208 restaurants, 345 bars, 95 golf courses, 50 libraries and 10 museums within short distances).
This home will go fast, so don't hesitate!
Serious inquiries only please.
Household must make 3x the rent amount each month, which is $52,000/year or more.
*Credit and background check required for $30 fee.
Details:
1,000 sqft
2 bedrooms
2 full bathrooms (bathtub in upstairs bathroom)
2.5 car garage - attached, fully finished
Fenced in backyard with deck and patio
HOA maintains front yard grass and snow removal
